name: Labyrinth Of Time
description:
!PLAY me in full screen :D!

This is a game made with the Loop time theme, for the first jam in the  Junior Unity Developer Bootcamp by Generation 

Here are some of the assets we use:

https://pixel-boy.itch.io/ninja-adventure-asset-pack

https://penzilla.itch.io/hooded-protagonist

https://little-martian.itch.io/retro-texture-pack

Here are some of the sounds we use:

https://freesound.org/people/onderwish/sounds/468397/

https://freesound.org/search/?q=deathscyp__spiketrap

Link to the GDD and TGDD:

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1sgP91d2522yvD7TZH7RVvWVTJuURtMIL?usp=sha...
